plugins.name: mcp-timeout-duration
plugins.description: Maximum time to wait for MCP server responses before timeout (milliseconds). Recommended: 30000ms production, 60000ms development.

plugins.name: mcp-retry-attempts
plugins.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed MCP calls. Recommended: 3 for production, 1 for development.

plugins.name: skill-cache-ttl
plugins.description: Time to live for cached skill content in seconds. Recommended: 3600 (1 hour) for production.

plugins.name: parallel-tool-execution
plugins.description: Enable parallel execution of independent tool calls. Significantly improves performance for multi-step operations.

plugins.name: token-budget-limit
plugins.description: Maximum tokens per request. Recommended: 200000 for complex tasks, 100000 for standard operations.

plugins.name: response-streaming
plugins.description: Enable streaming responses for real-time output. Improves perceived performance and user experience.

plugins.name: context-window-size
plugins.description: Maximum context window size in tokens. Recommended: 200000 for Opus/Sonnet.

plugins.name: agent-cache-strategy
plugins.description: Agent prompt caching strategy. Options: none, session, persistent. Recommended: session for most use cases.

plugins.name: batch-operation-size
plugins.description: Maximum items to process in a single batch operation. Recommended: 10 for file operations, 50 for data processing.

plugins.name: network-timeout
plugins.description: Network operation timeout in milliseconds. Recommended: 30000ms for most operations.

plugins.name: lazy-skill-loading
plugins.description: Enable progressive disclosure for skills. Loads full skill content only when needed. Saves 88-92% tokens.

plugins.name: compression-enabled
plugins.description: Enable response compression for large outputs. Reduces bandwidth and improves transfer speed.

plugins.name: require-env-validation
plugins.description: Validate all required environment variables before execution. Prevents runtime errors from missing config.

plugins.name: sandbox-mode
plugins.description: Restrict file system access to project directory. Prevents accidental modification of system files.

plugins.name: api-key-rotation-days
plugins.description: Days before showing API key rotation warning. Recommended: 90 days for production keys.

plugins.name: allowed-domains
plugins.description: Whitelist of domains for external API calls. Comma-separated list. Empty allows all domains.

plugins.name: audit-log-enabled
plugins.description: Enable security audit logging for all sensitive operations. Recommended for production environments.

plugins.name: mcp-permission-model
plugins.description: MCP server permission model. Options: strict, permissive, custom. Recommended: strict for production.

plugins.name: credential-encryption
plugins.description: Encrypt stored credentials at rest. Highly recommended for production environments.

plugins.name: rate-limit-per-hour
plugins.description: Maximum API requests per hour. Recommended: 1000 for development, 5000 for production.

plugins.name: disallowed-commands
plugins.description: Blacklist dangerous bash commands. Comma-separated list. Recommended: rm -rf, dd, mkfs.

plugins.name: require-signature-verification
plugins.description: Verify package signatures before installation. Recommended for production environments.

plugins.name: auto-git-commit
plugins.description: Automatically commit changes after successful operations. Creates detailed commit messages.

plugins.name: conventional-commits
plugins.description: Enforce conventional commit message format (feat:, fix:, docs:, etc.). Improves changelog generation.

plugins.name: pre-commit-hooks
plugins.description: Enable pre-commit validation hooks. Runs linting, formatting, and tests before commits.

plugins.name: test-before-deploy
plugins.description: Run all tests before deployments. Prevents deploying broken code to production.

plugins.name: linting-enabled
plugins.description: Enable automatic linting for generated code. Ensures code quality and consistency.

plugins.name: format-on-save
plugins.description: Auto-format files after edits. Ensures consistent formatting across the codebase.

plugins.name: typescript-strict-mode
plugins.description: Enforce TypeScript strict mode for all generated TypeScript code. Catches more bugs at compile time.

plugins.name: dependency-auto-update
plugins.description: Automatically update dependencies during operations. Options: none, patch, minor, major.

plugins.name: default-rpc-provider
plugins.description: Default blockchain RPC provider. Options: alchemy, infura, quicknode, helius. Recommended: helius for Solana.

plugins.name: subgraph-endpoint
plugins.description: The Graph subgraph endpoint preference. Options: hosted, studio, decentralized.

plugins.name: wallet-adapter-priority
plugins.description: Wallet connection priority order. Comma-separated list. Example: phantom,solflare,backpack for Solana.

plugins.name: ipfs-gateway-url
plugins.description: IPFS gateway preference. Options: ipfs.io, cloudflare-ipfs.com, dweb.link, custom.

plugins.name: analytics-enabled
plugins.description: Enable usage analytics and telemetry. Helps improve Claude Code. No sensitive data collected.

plugins.name: error-reporting-service
plugins.description: Error tracking service. Options: sentry, bugsnag, rollbar, none. Recommended: sentry for production.

plugins.name: monitoring-dashboard
plugins.description: Monitoring service integration. Options: datadog, newrelic, grafana, none. Recommended: datadog for comprehensive monitoring.

plugins.name: performance-profiling-setting
plugins.description: Enable performance profiling for operations. Tracks execution time and resource usage.

plugins.name: memory-usage-alerts
plugins.description: Alert on high memory usage. Threshold in MB. Recommended: 1024 for most systems.

plugins.name: slow-query-threshold-ms
plugins.description: Log queries exceeding threshold in milliseconds. Recommended: 1000ms for database queries.

plugins.name: error-notification-webhook
plugins.description: Webhook URL for error notifications. Supports Slack, Discord, custom endpoints.

plugins.name: uptime-monitoring
plugins.description: Enable uptime monitoring for deployed services. Checks health endpoints periodically.

plugins.name: cost-tracking
plugins.description: Track API usage costs in real-time. Shows estimated costs for Claude API, RPC calls, and external services.

plugins.name: bundle-analyzer-enabled
plugins.description: Enable bundle analysis for frontend builds. Identifies optimization opportunities.

plugins.name: tree-shaking
plugins.description: Enable tree shaking to remove unused code. Significantly reduces bundle size.

plugins.name: code-splitting-strategy
plugins.description: Code splitting strategy. Options: route, component, vendor. Recommended: route for Next.js apps.

plugins.name: image-optimization
plugins.description: Enable automatic image optimization. Converts to WebP, generates responsive sizes.

plugins.name: cdn-caching-strategy
plugins.description: CDN cache strategy. Options: aggressive, balanced, conservative. Recommended: balanced for most apps.
